name: 3D Platformer - Falling Princess
description:
Inspired by Stuffed! by MSU GameDev

WASD: Movement

Spacebar(on ground): Prepare for Gliding

Spacebar(in air): Glide!

No jumping! Falling too fast would kill the princess!

GOAL: Reach the bottom of the tower!

1.New environment from scratch
